amendment.description: To address the time period for consideration of the small issuer exemption.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 393 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 393 proposed by Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 392. (consideration: CR S3528-3535; text: CR S3528) To address the time period for consideration of the small issuer exemption.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 393 proposed by Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 392.
